section.title: Core powerdown
section.p: To take a core out of coherence ready for powerdown, the following power down steps must be performed:

Set the CPUPWRCTLR.CORE_PWRDN_EN bit to 1 to indicate to the power controller that a powerdown is requested.

section.p: All L1 and L2 cache disabling, L1 and L2 cache flushing, and communication with the L3 memory system is performed in hardware after the WFI is executed, under the direction of the power controller.
section.note: Executing any WFI instruction when the CPUPWRCTLR.CORE_PWRDN_EN bit is set automatically masks out all interrupts and wake-up events in the . If executed when the CPUPWRCTLR.CORE_PWRDN_EN bit is set the WFI never wakes up and the needs to be reset to restart.
section.p: For information about cluster powerdown, see the Arm DynamIQ Shared Unit Technical Reference Manual.
